format.full-description: This AVHRR/3 1B description was generated using the AVHRR/3 PFS Excel document Issue 6 Revision 5 (eps_avhrrl1_6.5_names_masks.xls) and pfs2xml version 3.3

parameter.name: NE
parameter.description: Number of earth view per scanline for Full data (highest value)

parameter.name: NP
parameter.description: Number of navigation points at a sampling rate of 20 for a Full product (highest value)

image.name: Uniformity Test A
image.description: AVHRR Cloud Information Uniformity Test A (0=test failed or clear, 1=cloudy)

image.name: Uniformity Test B
image.description: AVHRR Cloud Information Uniformity Test A (0 =test failed or cloudy, 1=clear)

image.name: T3-T5 Test A
image.description: AVHRR Cloud Information T3-T5 Test A (0=test failed or clear, 1=cloudy)

image.name: T3-T5 Test B
image.description: AVHRR Cloud Information T3-T5 Test B (0 =test failed or cloudy, 1=clear)

image.name: T4-T3 Test A
image.description: AVHRR Cloud Information T4-T3 Test A (0=test failed or clear, 1=cloudy)

image.name: T4-T3 Test B
image.description: AVHRR Cloud Information T4-T3 Test B (0 =test failed or cloudy, 1=clear)

image.name: T4-T5 Test A
image.description: AVHRR Cloud Information T4-T5 Test A (0=test failed or clear, 1=cloudy)

image.name: T4-T5 Test B
image.description: AVHRR Cloud Information T4-T5 Test B (0 =test failed or cloudy, 1=clear)

image.name: Albedo Test A
image.description: AVHRR Cloud Information Albedo Test A (0=test failed or clear, 1=cloudy or snow/ice covered)

image.name: Albedo Test B
image.description: AVHRR Cloud Information Albedo Test B (0 =test failed or cloudy, 1=clear or snow/ice covered)

image.name: T4 Test A
image.description: AVHRR Cloud Information T4 Test A (0=test failed or clear, 1=cloudy or snow/ice covered)

image.name: T4 Test B
image.description: AVHRR Cloud Information T4 Test B (0 =test failed or cloudy, 1=clear or snow/ice covered)

image.name: Test Situations
image.description: AVHRR Cloud Information - number of the test situations (11 different test situations)

field.name: PARENT_PRODUCT_NAME_1
field.description: Name of the parent product from which this product has been produced. For Level 0 products, this field is filled with lower case x's.

field.name: PARENT_PRODUCT_NAME_2
field.description: Name of the parent product from which this product has been produced. For Level 0 products or products for which this is not appropriate, this field is filled with lower case x's.

field.name: PARENT_PRODUCT_NAME_3
field.description: Name of the parent product from which this product has been produced. For Level 0 products or products for which this is not appropriate, this field is filled with lower case x's.

field.name: PARENT_PRODUCT_NAME_4
field.description: Name of the parent product from which this product has been produced. For Level 0 products or products for which this is not appropriate, this field is filled with lower case x's.

item.name: All NOAA
item.description: instruments specific to Level 0 NOAA product
NOAC Global Area Coverage AVHRR data
ASCAT calibrated s0 data at full resolution
ASCAT calibrated s0 data at operational resolution (50 km)
ASCAT calibrated s0 data at research resolution (25 km)

field.name: SENSING_START
field.description: UTC Time of start of sensing data in this object (PDU, ROI or Full Product)

field.name: SENSING_END
field.description: UTC Time of end of sensing data in this object (PDU, ROI or Full Product)

field.name: SENSING_START_THEORETICAL
field.description: Theoretical UTC Time of start of sensing data in the dump from which this object is derived. This data is the predicted start time at the MPF level.

field.name: SENSING_END_THEORETICAL
field.description: Theoretical UTC Time of end of sensing data in the dump from which this object is derived. This data is the predicted end time at the MPF level.

item.description: First EUMETSAT EPS Core Ground Segment
Second EUMETSAT EPS Core Ground Segment
Third EUMETSAT EPS Core Ground Segment

field.name: PROCESSING_TIME_START
field.description: UTC time of the processing at start of processing for the product

field.name: PROCESSING_TIME_END
field.description: UTC time of the processing at end of processing for the product

field.name: PROCESSING_MODE
field.description: Identification of the mode of processing

item.description: SOCC (NESDIS Satellite Operations Control Centre), Suitland, Maryland

field.name: RECEIVE_TIME_START
field.description: UTC time of the reception at CDA for first Data Item

field.name: RECEIVE_TIME_END
field.description: UTC time of the reception at CDA for last Data Item

field.name: ORBIT_START
field.description: Start Orbit Number, counted incrementally since launch

field.name: STATE_VECTOR_TIME
field.description: Epoch time (in UTC) of the orbital elements and the orbit state vector. this corresponds to the time of crossing the ascending node for ORBIT_START

field.name: SEMI_MAJOR_AXIS
field.description: Semi major axis of orbit at time of the ascending node crossing.

field.name: ECCENTRICITY
field.description: Orbit eccentricity at time of the ascending node crossing

field.name: INCLINATION
field.description: Orbit inclination at time of the ascending node crossing

field.name: PERIGEE_ARGUMENT
field.description: Argument of perigee at time of the ascending node crossing

field.name: RIGHT_ASCENSION
field.description: Right ascension at time of the ascending node crossing

field.name: MEAN_ANOMALY
field.description: Mean anomaly at time of the ascending node crossing

field.name: X_POSITION
field.description: X position of the orbit state vector in the orbit frame at ascending node

field.name: Y_POSITION
field.description: Y position of the orbit state vector in the orbit frame at ascending node

field.name: Z_POSITION
field.description: Z position of the orbit state vector in the orbit frame at ascending node

field.name: X_VELOCITY
field.description: X velocity of the orbit state vector in the orbit frame at ascending node

field.name: Y_VELOCITY
field.description: Y velocity of the orbit state vector in the orbit frame at ascending node

field.name: Z_VELOCITY
field.description: Z velocity of the orbit state vector in the orbit frame at ascending node

field.name: EARTH_SUN_DISTANCE_RATIO
field.description: Earth-Sun distance ratio - ratio of current Eart-Sun distance to Mean Earth-Sun distance

field.name: SUBSAT_LATITUDE_START
field.description: Latitude of sub-satellite point at start of the data set

field.name: SUBSAT_LONGITUDE_START
field.description: Longitude of sub-satellite point at start of the data set

field.name: SUBSAT_LATITUDE_END
field.description: Latitude of sub-satellite point at end of the data set

field.name: SUBSAT_LONGITUDE_END
field.description: Longitude of sub-satellite point at end of the data set

field.name: LEAP_SECOND
field.description: Occurence of Leap second within the product. Field is set to -1, 0 or +1 dependent upon occurrence of leap second and direction.

field.name: LEAP_SECOND_UTC
field.description: UTC time of occurrence of the Leap Second (If no leap second in the product, value is null)

field.name: TOTAL_RECORDS
field.description: Total count of all records in the product

field.name: TOTAL_MPHR
field.description: Total count of all MPHRs in product (should always be 1!)

field.name: TOTAL_SPHR
field.description: Total count of all SPHRs in product (should be 0 or 1 only)

field.name: TOTAL_IPR
field.description: Total count of all IPRs in the product

field.name: TOTAL_GEADR
field.description: Total count of all GEADRs in the product

field.name: TOTAL_GIADR
field.description: Total count of all GIADRs in the product

field.name: TOTAL_VEADR
field.description: Total count of all VEADRs in the product

field.name: TOTAL_VIADR
field.description: Total count of all VIADRs in the product

field.name: TOTAL_MDR
field.description: Total count of all MDRs in the product

field.name: COUNT_DEGRADED_INST_MDR
field.description: Count of MDRs with degradation due to instrument problems

field.name: COUNT_DEGRADED_PROC_MDR
field.description: Count of MDRs with degradation due to processing problems

field.name: COUNT_DEGRADED_INST_MDR_BLOCKS
field.description: Count of the number of blocks of MDRs degraded due to degraded instrument

field.name: COUNT_DEGRADED_PROC_MDR_BLOCKS
field.description: Count of the number of blocks of MDRs degraded due to degraded processing

field.name: DURATION_OF_PRODUCT
field.description: The duration of the product in milliseconds

field.name: MILLISECONDS_OF_DATA_PRESENT
field.description: The total amount of data present in the product

field.name: MILLISECONDS_OF_DATA_MISSING
field.description: The total amount of data missing from the prodcut

field.name: SUBSETTED_PRODUCT
field.description: Set when product has been subsetted (e.g. geographically subsetted using a region of interest filter). Implies the presence of one or more UMARF GIADRs in GAD section for product retrieved from UMARF.

field.name: SRC_DATA_QUAL
field.description: Flag to specify which combination of auxiliary data is used for the scenes analysis.

bit.name: NWP_T2M_CHANGE
bit.description: Availability of NWP T2M is changing during the dump

bit.name: NWP_TCWV_CHANGE
bit.description: Availability of NWP TCWV is changing during the dump

bit.name: AMSUA_TCWV_CHANGE
bit.description: Availability of AMSU-A TCWV is changing during the dump

bit.name: NWP_TCWV_MISSING
bit.description: NWP TCWV is missing

bit.name: AMSUA_TCWV_NWP_T2M_MISSING
bit.description: AMSU-A TCWV and NWP T2M are missing

bit.name: AMSUA_TCWV_NWP_TCWV_MISSING
bit.description: AMSU-A TCWV and NWP TCWV are missing

bit.name: AMSUA_TCWV_MISSING
bit.description: AMSU-A TCWV is missing

bit.name: NWP_T2M_MISSING
bit.description: NWP T2M is missing

bit.name: NWP_TCWV_NWP_T2M_MISSING
bit.description: NWP TCWV and NWP T2M are missing

bit.name: AMSUA_TCWV_NWP_TCWV_NWP_T2M_MISSING
bit.description: AMSU-A TCWV, NWP TCWV, and NWP T2M are missing

field.name: EARTH_VIEWS_PER_SCANLINE
field.description: Number of Earth views per scanline (2048 for Full, 409 for GAC data)

field.name: NAV_SAMPLE_RATE
field.description: Rate of sampling the navigation data (angular relation and earth location). For Full data every 40th or 20th Earth view. For GAC data every 8th or 4th Earth view

giadr.name: giadr-radiance
giadr.description: PRT Temperature conversion factors, intercept, slope, and central wavenumber for the band correction for channels 3b, 4, and 5

bit.name: CH5
bit.description: ramp non-linearity for GAC & Full Resolution ch 5

bit.name: CH4
bit.description: ramp non-linearity for GAC and Full Resolution ch4

bit.name: CH3B
bit.description: ramp non-linearity for GAC and Full Resolution ch 3b

bit.name: CH3A
bit.description: ramp non-linearity for GAC and Full Resolution ch 3a

bit.name: CH2
bit.description: ramp non-linearity for GAC and Full Resolution ch 2

bit.name: CH1
bit.description: ramp non-linearity for GAC and Full Resolution ch 1

field.name: YEAR_RECENT_CALIBRATION
field.description: Year of Most Recent Solar Channel Calibration (e.g. 1999)

field.name: DAY_RECENT_CALIBRATION
field.description: Day of Year of Most Recent Solar Channel Calibration (e.g. 365)

bit.name: Ch_5_resolution
bit.description: 0 = high, 1 = low

bit.name: Ch_5_substitution_coefficients
bit.description: 0 = no, 1 = yes

bit.name: Ch_4_resolution
bit.description: 0 = high, 1 = low

bit.name: Ch_4_substitution_coefficients
bit.description: 0 = no, 1 = yes

bit.name: Ch_3b_resolution
bit.description: 0 = high, 1 = low

bit.name: Ch_3b_substitution_coefficients
bit.description: 0 = no, 1 = yes

bit.name: Ch_5_resolution
bit.description: 0 = high, 1 = low

bit.name: Ch_5_substitution_coefficients
bit.description: 0 = no, 1 = yes

bit.name: Ch_4_resolution
bit.description: 0 = high, 1 = low

bit.name: Ch_4_substitution_coefficients
bit.description: 0 = no, 1 = yes

bit.name: Ch_3b_resolution
bit.description: 0 = high, 1 = low

bit.name: Ch_3b_substitution_coefficients
bit.description: 0 = no, 1 = yes

field.name: CH1_SOLAR_FILTERED_IRRADIANCE
field.description: Ch 1 Solar Filtered Irradiance in Wavelength

field.name: CH1_EQUIVALENT_FILTER_WIDTH
field.description: Ch 1 Equivalent Filter Width in Wavelength

field.name: CH2_SOLAR_FILTERED_IRRADIANCE
field.description: Ch 2 Solar Filtered Irradiance in Wavelength

field.name: CH2_EQUIVALENT_FILTER_WIDTH
field.description: Ch 2 Equivalent Filter Width in Wavelength

field.name: CH3A_SOLAR_FILTERED_IRRADIANCE
field.description: Ch 3a Solar Filtered Irradiance in Wavelength

field.name: CH3A_EQUIVALENT_FILTER_WIDTH
field.description: Ch 3a Equivalent Filter Width in Wavelength

field.name: CH3B_CONSTANT2_SLOPE
field.description: Ch 3b Constant 2 slope for band correction

field.name: CH4_CONSTANT2_SLOPE
field.description: Ch 4 Constant 2 slope for band correction

field.name: CH5_CONSTANT2_SLOPE
field.description: Ch 5 Constant 2 slope for band correction

field.name: DEGRADED_INST_MDR
field.description: Quality of MDR has been degraded from nominal due to an instrument degradation

field.name: DEGRADED_PROC_MDR
field.description: Quality of MDR has been degraded from nominal due to a processing degradation

Scene radiance for channels 1, 2, 3a or 3b, 4 & 5. Channels 1,2, 3a in units of W/(m^2.sr). Channels 3b, 4 , 5 in units of mW/(m^2.sr.cm). Channels 1,2,4 & 5 with scale factor = 2. Channels 3a or 3b with scale factor = 4.

bit.name: Spare
bit.description: Not used

bit.name: EL_Corrected
bit.description: Earth location corrected for Euler angles

bit.name: EL_Indicator
bit.description: Earth location indicator (0 = earth location available, 1 = user ephemeris files older than 24 hours, 2 = no earth location available )

bit.name: SA_Control
bit.description: Spacecraft attitude control (0 = operating in YGC or NOMINAL mode, 1 = operating in another mode, 2 = attitude exceeds nominal tolerance)

bit.name: A_SMODE
bit.description: Attitude SMODE (0 = NOMINAL mode, 1 = rate nulling mode, 2 = YGC mode, 3 = search mode, 4 = coast mode)

bit.name: A_MODE
bit.description: Attitude mode (0 = NOMINAL mode/no test, 1 = yaw axis test in progress, 2 = roll axis test in progress, 3 = pitch axis test in progress)

field.description: Angular relationship for the first earth view in scanline
Angular relationship for the last earth view in scanline
Earth location for the first earth view in scanline
Earth location for the last earth view in scanline

field.name: NUM_NAVIGATION_POINTS
field.description: Number of navigation points in angular_relations and earth_locations arrays, NP
Angular relationships: solar zenith angle, satellite zenith angle, solar azimuth angle, satellite azimuth angle (points 25 to 2025, each 40th point, possible reduction to every 20th point)
Earth Location: latitude, longitude (points 25 to 2025, each 40th point, possible reduction to every 20th point)

bit.name: do_not_use_scan_for_product_generation
bit.description: do not use scan for product generation

bit.name: time_sequence_error_detected_with_this_scan
bit.description: time sequence error detected with this scan

bit.name: data_gap_precedes_this_scan
bit.description: data gap precedes this scan

bit.name: insufficient_data_for_calibration
bit.description: insufficient data for calibration

bit.name: earth_location_data_not_available
bit.description: earth location data not available

bit.name: first_good_time_following_a_clock_update
bit.description: first good time following a clock update (nominally 0)

bit.name: instrument_status_changed_with_this_scan
bit.description: instrument status changed with this scan

bit.name: sync_lock_dropped_during_this_frame
bit.description: sync lock dropped during this frame - DEFAULT TO ZERO

bit.name: frame_sync_word_error_greater_than_zero
bit.description: frame sync word error greater than zero- DEFAULT TO ZERO

bit.name: frame_sync_previously_dropped_lock
bit.description: frame sync previously dropped lock- DEFAULT TO ZERO

bit.name: flywheeling_detected_during_this_frame
bit.description: flywheeling detected during this frame- DEFAULT TO ZERO

bit.name: bit_slippage_detected_during_this_frame
bit.description: bit slippage detected during this frame- DEFAULT TO ZERO

bit.name: TIP_parity_error_detected
bit.description: TIP parity error detected- DEFAULT TO ZERO

bit.name: reflected_sunlight_detected_ch3b
bit.description: reflected sunlight detected ch 3b (0 = no anomaly; 1 = anomaly; 3 = unsure)

bit.name: reflected_sunlight_detected_ch4
bit.description: reflected sunlight detected ch 4 (0 = no anomaly; 1 = anomaly; 3 = unsure)

bit.name: reflected_sunlight_detected_ch5
bit.description: reflected sunlight detected ch 5 (0 = no anomaly; 1 = anomaly; 3 = unsure)

bit.name: resync_occurred_on_this_frame
bit.description: resync occurred on this frame- DEFAULT TO ZERO

bit.name: pseudo_noise_occurred_on_this_frame
bit.description: pseudo noise occurred on this frame

delimiter.name: Time Problem Code (all bits off implies the scan time is as expected)

bit.name: not_used
bit.description: Not used

bit.name: bad_time_field_inferred_possible
bit.description: time field is bad but can probably be inferred from the previous good time

bit.name: bad_time_field_inferred_impossible
bit.description: time field is bad and can't be inferred from the previous good time

bit.name: time_discontinuity
bit.description: this record starts a sequence that is inconsistent with previous times (i.e., there is a time discontinuity). This may or may not be associated with a spacecraft clock update (See bit 26 in QUALITY_INDICATOR Field)

bit.name: repeated_scan_times
bit.description: start of a sequence that apparently repeats scan times that have been previously accepted

bit.name: not_used
bit.description: Not used

delimiter.name: Calibration Code Problem (Note these bits complement the channel indicators; all bits set to 0 indicates normal calibration. )

bit.name: scan_line_not_calibrated_bad_time
bit.description: Scan line was not calibrated because of bad time

bit.name: scan_line_calibrated_using_inadequate_data
bit.description: Scan line was calibrated using fewer than the preferred number of scan lines because of proximity to start or end of data set or to a data gap

bit.name: scan_line_not_calibrated_bad_prt_data
bit.description: Scan line was not calibrated because of bad or insufficient PRT data

bit.name: scan_line_calibrated_marginal_prt_data
bit.description: Scan line was calibrated but with marginal PRT data

bit.name: some_uncalibrated_channels_on_this_scan
bit.description: Some uncalibrated channels on this scan. (See channel indicators.)

bit.name: uncalibrated_due_to_instrument_mode
bit.description: Uncalibrated due to instrument mode.

bit.name: questionable_calibration_space_view
bit.description: Questionable calibration because of antenna position error of space view

bit.name: questionable_calibration_black_body
bit.description: Questionable calibration because of antenna position error of black body

delimiter.name: Earth Location Problem Code (all bits off indicates the Earth location was normal)

bit.name: not_earth_located_bad_time
bit.description: Not earth located because of bad time; earth location fields zero filled

bit.name: questionable_earth_location_time_code
bit.description: Earth location questionable because of questionable time code. (See time problem flags above.)

bit.name: questionable_earth_location_marginal
bit.description: Earth location questionable - only marginal agreement with reasonableness check.

bit.name: questionable_earth_location_failed
bit.description: Earth location questionable - fails reasonableness check

bit.name: questionable_earth_location_antenna_position
bit.description: Earth location questionable because of antenna position check

bit.name: not_used
bit.description: Not used

bit.name: calibrated
bit.description: this channel is not calibrated

bit.name: questionable
bit.description: this channel is calibrated but questionable

bit.name: bad_blackbody
bit.description: all bad blackbody counts for scan line

bit.name: bad_space_view
bit.description: all bad space view counts for scan line

bit.name: marginal_blackbody
bit.description: marginal blackbody view counts for this line

bit.name: marginal_space_view
bit.description: marginal space view counts for this line

field.name: COUNT_ERROR_FRAME
field.description: Count of Bit Errors in Frame Sync. This field is applicable only to NOAA data. For Metop data it should be defaulted to zero.
IR Operational Calibration Second Order Term (ch. 3b,4,5)
IR Operational Calibration First Order Term (ch. 3b,4,5)
IR Operational Calibration Zeroth Order Term (ch. 3b,4,5)
IR Test Calibration Second Order Term (ch. 3b,4,5)
IR Test Calibration First Order Term (ch. 3b,4,5)
IR Test Calibration Zeroth Order Term (ch. 3b,4,5)

bit.name: Uniformity_test_a
bit.description: 0=test failed or clear, 1=cloudy

bit.name: Uniformity_test_b
bit.description: 0 =test failed or cloudy, 1=clear

bit.name: T3_T5_test_a
bit.description: 0=test failed or clear, 1=cloudy

bit.name: T3_T5_test_b
bit.description: 0 =test failed or cloudy, 1=clear

bit.name: T4_T3_test_a
bit.description: 0=test failed or clear, 1=cloudy

bit.name: T4_T3_test_b
bit.description: 0 =test failed or cloudy, 1=clear

bit.name: T4_T5_test_a
bit.description: 0=test failed or clear, 1=cloudy

bit.name: T4_T5_test_b
bit.description: 0 =test failed or cloudy, 1=clear

bit.name: Albedo_test_a
bit.description: 0=test failed or clear, 1=cloudy or snow/ice covered

bit.name: Albedo_test_b
bit.description: 0 =test failed or cloudy, 1=clear or snow/ice covered

bit.name: T4_test_a
bit.description: 0=test failed or clear, 1=cloudy or snow/ice covered

bit.name: T4_test_b
bit.description: 0 =test failed or cloudy, 1=clear or snow/ice covered

bit.name: Number_of_the_test_situation
bit.description: 11 different test situations

field.description: Frame Sync. This field is applicable only to NOAA data. For Metop data the field will be zeroed.

field.name: FRAME_INDICATOR
field.description: Frame ID. This field is applicable only to NOAA data. For Metop data the all bits will be unset.

bit.name: Sync
bit.description: 0 = internal sysn, 1 = AVHRR sync

bit.name: Frame
bit.description: DEFAULT TO ZERO (0 = Not an HRPT frame but a GAC frame, 1 = minor frame 1, 2 = minor frame 2, 3 =minor frame 3)

bit.name: Stable
bit.description: 0 = frame stable, 1 = frame resync occurred

bit.name: Input
bit.description: 0 = pseudonoise AVHRR input, 1 = normal AVHRR input

bit.name: Channel_Input
bit.description: 0 = AVHRR channel 3b, 1 = AVHRR channel 3a

field.name: TIME_CODE
field.description: Time Code. This field is applicable only to NOAA data. For Metop data the all bits will be unset.

bit.name: day
bit.description: Binary day count

bit.name: millisecond_msp
bit.description: most significant part of the binary millisecond day count

bit.name: millisecond_p
bit.description: part of binary millisecond of day count

bit.name: millisecond_lsp
bit.description: least significant part of binary millisecond of day count

field.description: Internal Target Temperature Count Reading (1 - 3) - (Three readings from one of the four platinum resistance thermometers (PRT). A different PRT is sampled for each scan; every fifth scan will contain a reference value of 0 in place of each reading.)

bit.name: motor_telemetry
bit.description: 0=off, 1 =on

bit.name: electronics_telemetry
bit.description: 0=off, 1 =on

bit.name: channel_1_status
bit.description: 0 = disable, 1 = enable

bit.name: channel_2_status
bit.description: 0 = disable, 1 = enable

bit.name: channel_3a_status
bit.description: 0 = disable, 1 = enable

bit.name: channel_3b_status
bit.description: 0 = disable, 1 = enable

bit.name: channel_4_status
bit.description: 0 = disable, 1 = enable

bit.name: channel_5_status
bit.description: 0 = disable, 1 = enable

bit.name: voltage_calibrate_status
bit.description: 0 = off, 1 = on

bit.name: cooler_heat
bit.description: 0 = off, 1 = on

bit.name: scan_motor
bit.description: 0 = low, 1 = high

bit.name: telemetry_lock
bit.description: 0 = off, 1 = lock

bit.name: earth_shield
bit.description: 0 = disable, 1 = deploy

bit.name: patch_control
bit.description: 0 = off, 1 = on

bit.name: reference_voltage
bit.description: word 22
words 21 through 2 (in order)

bit.name: patch_control
bit.description: 0=off, 1=on
